title: La Autentica Foods, LLC Firm Recalls Meat Tamale Products Due To Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, May 7, 2016 La Autentica Foods, LLC., a Hialeah, Fla. establishment, is recalling approximately 117,350 pounds of meat tamale products that may be adulterated with Listeria Monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The heat-treated, not fully cooked...
